item.description:
CATHERINE L. MORRISSEY MEMORIAL READING

ALICE NOTLEY & ELENI SIKELIANOS

Wednesday, April 17, at 6:00 p.m.
Edison-Newman Room, Houghton Library, Harvard Yard

Free and open to the public. Photo ID required for entry.


The finale event in Woodberry Poetry Roomâ€™s Poet's Voice series, a
reading by two capacious creators of uncompromising works and worlds:
Alice Notley (author of over 25 poetry collections, including Culture
of One) and Eleni Sikelianos (author of The Loving Detail of the
Living & the Dead and The California Poem). This Poet's Voice reading
also marks our first annual Catherine L. Morrissey reading, honoring
the life and work of the poet and Harvard G'76 alum. A book-signing
will follow.
item.name: Notley and Sikelianos at Harvard's Houghton Library
